recentremovedtoast.description: The group was removed from your recent groups list.

addbyurl.description: If a group was shared with you, you can paste its URL here to add it to your list.
addbyurl.error: Oops, we are not able to find the group from the URL you provided‚Ä¶

namefield.label: Group name
namefield.description: Enter a name for your group.

currencyfield.description: We‚Äôll use it to display amounts.

settings.title: Local settings
settings.description: These settings are set per-device, and are used to customize your experience.

activeuserfield.label: Active user
activeuserfield.description: User used as default for paying expenses.

titlefield.label: Income title
titlefield.description: Enter a description for the income.

datefield.label: Income date
datefield.description: Enter the date the income was received.

paidbyfield.label: Received by
paidbyfield.description: Select the participant who received the income.

paidfor.description: Select who the income was received for.

titlefield.label: Expense title
titlefield.description: Enter a description for the expense.

datefield.description: Enter the date the expense was paid.

paidbyfield.label: Paid by
paidbyfield.description: Select the participant who paid the expense.

paidfor.title: Paid for
paidfor.description: Select who the expense was paid for.

expense.splitmodedescription: Select how to split the expense.

errortoast.description: Something wrong happened when uploading the document. Please retry later or select a different file.

information.title: Information
information.description: Use this place to add any information that can be relevant to the group participants.

share.description: For other participants to see the group and add expenses, share its URL with them.

schema_errors.duplicate_participant_name: Another participant already has this name.
